text: (ai rasool) tum kah do ki kya khuda ko jo saare aasamaan va zameen ka paida karane vaala hai chhod kar doosare ko (apana) saraparast banao aur vahee (sab ko) rozee deta hai aur usako koee rozee nahin deta (ai rasool) tum kah do ki mujhe hukm diya gaya hai ki sab se pahale islaam laane vaala main hoon aur (ye bhee ki khabaradaar) musharekeen se na hona
